post.body: michigan. duh. we traveled overnight. and we have lots of snow.
he's just going to recite bible verses until they're scared away. no muscles.
you see there will be blood and then tell me if you want to be his friend.
we're on the road and i cant sleep.
the little miss sunshine one or the there will be blood one? both are creepy.
stop with the fighting!
same here. katie's graduation brunch at seasons by the lake. started way before we got there though.
I still don't understand. Did u meltdown after shopping with me and michael? What do they do to you?
why all the crying? You should feel good.
